rules_text:
When Sinuous Shipbreaker enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} [i](two energy counters)[/i].
Whenever Sinuous Shipbreaker attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, Sinuous Shipbreaker gains your choice of beyond or lifelink until end of turn. [i](A creature with beyond can’t be blocked except by three or more creatures or by creatures with beyond.)[/i]
